channel.title: Lost password
channel.description: I lost my pass xD my names are lesterknome and phantasizer. I was hoping someone could reset

item.title: Lost password
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:9, topic:377436”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=473333.msg3461934#msg3461934 date=1294544039]

You guys miss the point. The Minecraft server is hosted in the same place as the web server for the forums, which contains sensitive information. Those programs give access to the computer itself, which is not what we want. We want something where I can edit only certain files via some sort of web script if best, or a utility that allows access to only certain directories.

I recently made myself admin and looked through the commands, and honestly I don’t think you need physical access to any of the files do you? You can ban by IP or username, modify groups, create groups, add people to groups, and reset passwords:

http://wiki.nexua.org/Plugin:AuthCraft

All via the built-in minecraft chat. Is there anything you can’t do from the chat?

@lesterknome, if davidi doesn’t reset it before I log in, then I will reset it. I can’t currently log in from this computer though.
[/quote]Ah, I didn’t know about all of those extra hmod commands. Will definitely use those. The only one it seems I can’t do is make new groups, but I probably wont need to do that.

I think you can add groups with /modify can’t you?

http://wiki.hey0.net/index.php/Commands[/quote]That’s where I was looking when I found the other commands; it appears that modify is used on players?

Read full topic
